name: Average Student Loan Debt - Part 1 of 4320
description:
The total student loan debt in the US is an estimated $1,750,000,000,000 held by roughly 43,200,000 US citizens; $40,509 divided equally among student loan borrowers. The price of this NFT is equivalent to this amount at the time of minting.

Profits from the sale of this NFT edition will be donated to the Student Debt Crisis Center (https://studentdebtcrisis.org/) on a quarterly basis with reports posted to the artist's Twitter account.

Source: Student Loan Debt Statistics (https://educationdata.org/student-loan-debt-statistics) Accessed 12/22/2021 1PM MST
